meanings: (목숨을) kill, take sb's life, (살해하다) murder, (informal) knock sb off, (신문·문학 용어) slay, (학살하다) slaughter, butcher, ...
Verb bring down, make something blunt

meanings.meaning: put a person to bed with a shovel

vlive.korean: 왜 숨죽여서 닫아.. Why are you breathless when closing door? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [은서] 오늘의 이야기 Ep.02
vlive.english: Why are you breathless when closing door?

vlive.korean: 갑자기 죽여서 미안해요. Sorry for saying that you will die. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [REPLAY] INFINITE NAM WOO HYUN's LieV - 인피니트 남우현의 눕방 라이브!
vlive.english: Sorry for saying that you will die.

vlive.korean: "안 됩니다. 이 사람을 죽여선 안 됩니다". "No way. You can't kill this person". 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - THE BEAT SEASON 4 -02- '육성재의 친구를 소개합니다!'
vlive.english: "No way. You can't kill this person".

vlive.korean: 우리 스탭들이 굉장히 숨죽여서 보고 있어요. My staff is watching me in silence. 듣기 View video LEE JONG SUK : 맥락없는 이종석의 소환 방송♡
vlive.english: My staff is watching me in silence.

vlive.korean: 그래서 제가 '이것들은 가만히 죽여서는 안 되겠다' 라는 생각을 했어요. and I thought I shouldn't just let them die easily. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : 몬즐라 2주년 특별편성ㅜㅜ다시
vlive.english: and I thought I shouldn't just let them die easily.

examples.korean: They put the writer to bed with a shovel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 작가를 죽여서 파묻었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They put the writer to bed with a shovel. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: People shouldn't kill them to make money. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 돈을 벌기 위해 그것들을 죽여서는 않됩니다. Neungyule
examples.english: People shouldn't kill them to make money. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They try to stop CWD by killing sick deer and elk. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 병든 사슴과 엘크를 죽여서 CWD를 막으려고 한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They try to stop CWD by killing sick deer and elk. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: No matter how small and insignificant a creature may be, you can't just kill it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아무리 하찮은 미물이라도 함부로 죽여서는 안 된다 Neungyule
examples.english: No matter how small and insignificant a creature may be, you can't just kill it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If anyone was caught killing a cat, the person could be put to death. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만약에 누가 고양이를 죽여서 잡히게되면 그 사람은 사형에 처해질 수도 있었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If anyone was caught killing a cat, the person could be put to death. Add to Wordbook
